data.title: Orlando Convention Events
data.meta_description: Check out Orlando convention events during your stay at Floridays Resort Orlando.
data.text:
Floridays is the resort to book for your Orlando business trip

Only 4.5 miles from the Orange County Convention Center, Floridays is just a 12 - 15 minute drive to your Orlando citywide event. Our spacious 2 and 3 bedroom suites offer fully-equipped kitchens, washer and dryer, dining room and living room, and a private balcony. Looking to unwind after a day of meetings? Enjoy a poolside cocktail or grab a meal at our Palm Caf√© or the Pool Bar. Our state-of-the-art fitness center offers a great way to start the day or to burn some energy after a long day. Being less than a mile from Orlando Vineland Premium Outlets, you'll even have time to bring a souvenir home to the family from your trip.

View Our Special Offers
